ComicInfo.Series: Dicks: To the End of Time, Like
ComicInfo.Summary:
GARTH ENNIS has made amusing readers the highest priority as he and JOHN MCCREA send the Boys from Belfast on a trip through time! The Dicks are here to leave no insult unslung and no offence untaken as they gather artifacts through the ages trying to prevent the end of us all. Or, well, at least prevent a very bad day for a couple folks.
Available with Regular, Offensive, and Classic Moment Incentive covers by McCrea.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-----------|-------------------------------------------|-------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | John McCrea | 1 | | Offensive | Offensive Wraparound Cover | John McCrea | 2 | | RI | Retailer Incentive "Classic Moment" Cover | John McCrea | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: 3: Lilliburlero
